TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OutputAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OutputAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義工作作者用於識別從工作輸出資料之工作屬性 (Property) 的中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify task properties that output data from the task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]引擎只會允許輸出資料標示了這個屬性從工作的工作屬性。The [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will only allow task properties marked with this attribute to output data from a task. 專案作者只能使用標示了這個屬性中的屬性`Output`專案檔案的項目。Project authors can only use properties marked with this attribute in the `Output` element of a project file. 所有其他工作屬性會被視為工作的輸入。All other task properties are treated as inputs to a task. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用屬性擴充中繼資料](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個或多個目錄工作的程式碼。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
